name: Halo of Spores
description: Starting at 2nd level, you are surrounded by invisible, necrotic spores that deal necrotic damage to a creature within 10 feet when it moves into that space or starts its turn there, unless it succeeds on a Constitution saving throw. The damage scales with level: 1d4 at 2nd, 1d6 at 6th, 1d8 at 10th, and 1d10 at 14th level.
